definitions.definition: Finely chopped mixed fruit used in Christmas pies; mincemeat.
definitions.example: During Christmas time my dad loves to eat mince pies.

definitions.definition: An affected (often dainty or short and precise) gait.
An affected manner, especially of speaking; an affectation.
(chiefly in the plural) An eye (from mince pie).
To lessen; diminish; to diminish in speaking; speak of lightly or slightingly; minimise.
To cut into very small pieces; to chop fine.
definitions.example: Butchers often use machines to mince meat.

definitions.definition: To suppress or weaken the force of
To say or utter vaguely, not directly or frankly
To affect; to pronounce affectedly or with an accent.
To walk with short steps; to walk in a prim, affected manner.
To act or talk with affected nicety; to affect delicacy in manner.
definitions.example: I love going to gay bars and seeing drag queens mince around on stage.
